oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Geometry and Dynamics of Quantum State Diffusion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Buric, Nikola
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Riemannian metric on real 2n-dimensional space associated with the equation governing complex diffusion of pure states of an open quantum system is introduced and studied. Examples of a qubit under the influence of dephasing and thermal environments are used to show that the curvature of the diffusion metric is a good indicator of the properties of the environment dominated evolution and its stability.
